title: mAtADa bEkayyA (maNipravALam)
sahitya:
mAtADa bEkayya nAtO marakatavaNNA manam kaLindu nI


anupallavi

  muddu mudugA unmozhi kETTu citta harSENa nA mai maracuDa


caraNam 1    pondina nara janmamulO tva krpayA santa janulu jatakUDi rAmA
 un pugazh pADi pUjalu mADi vandaDainda nannu brOtunu ennoru
    caraNam 2    naDaci naDaci munu nangaikkaruL tandu karadhrta cApEna kapikkaruL kUrndu
 aDutta arakkanukku abhayamiccina nIvu ahamasmi ini anjabEDA enru
